Penance {2}{R}{R}{G}{G}{W}{W} [i](If you cast this for its penance cost, replace all numbers in brackets with the greatest power or toughness among your creatures.)[/i]
For each creature card in your graveyard, create a token that’s a copy of that creature, except it’s [b][1][/b]/[b][1][/b] and has haste and lifelink. Sacrifice those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.
